text: Patrick Quivrin (born 6 November 1952) is a French fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:French male fencers Category:French sabre fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Patrick Quivrin
